item.title: Changelog
item.description: All notable changes to this project will be documented in this section. [Unreleased] [2.0.0] - 2020-03-05 Added Release dataset (DOI 10.17605/OSF.IO/M3NZD). Updated version impact ranking. Updated analysis career trajectories. Updated co-author network analysis. Prediction of H-Index. [1.1.1] - 2020-01-01 Changed Minor typesetting corrections. [1.1.0] - 2019-12-23 Changed Update of researchers to be added. [1.0.0] - 2019-12-16 Added Upload website.
